comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: It is great to compare 'Then', 'then', and 'now'. Google Maps Street View is too low down - g.co/maps/tn6wr . The Google Earth plugin produced this - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia/7127624061/]

comment.author: 54968992@N03
comment._content: Nice one Carol, good shot and nice story to go with it!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Absolutely too low down. I think we may well need to encourage Google to do Hill View for some of the Lawrence Photographic Project images that we'll be uploading over the next 31 weeks. We're going alphabetically, so today's was A is for Antrim.
